description: Prajogo Pangestu, born Phang Djoen Phen (Chinese: 彭雲鵬; Pe̍h-ōe-jī: Phênn Hûn Phîng; born in 13 May 1944) is an Indonesian business magnate, investor, and philanthropist who is the founder Indonesian conglomerate Barito Pacific Group, which engages in forestry, plantation, oil and gas, coal and gold mining, as well as geothermal. With a net worth of US$52.9 billion, he is the wealthiest person in South East Asia. In 2019, he was ranked as the 3rd richest person in Indonesia by Forbes.
